title: One shot: Finally found you
body:
Requested?    Yes  l   No

By: anonymous

Pairing: Chris Evans x Indian plus sized reader

Summary: Can you please do an Indian plus size reader x Chris Evans based on the song ‘Finally found you’ by Enrique Iglesias?

Warning(s): none

Word count: 825

Picture(s) found on: Pinterest/Google


[Enrique Iglesias:]
You know I’m go get you, yeah
Whatever it takes to get there
No I won’t drop you
Like everybody else does


Forget about your friends, they don’t care where we go
If they do, we’ll get lost in a crowd of people
I’ve been looking for you forever baby we go
Together baby we go, we go

In this crazy world of choices I’ve only got a few
Either you’re coming with me, or I’m coming with you
'Cause I finally found, I finally found you
You never have to worry if what I say is true
Girl I’ve been looking for you and when I saw you I knew
That I finally found, I finally found you

 

“Shit” you whispered while jogging down the street, occasionally bumping into people and quickly apologizing. Your heart was pounding in your chest as you felt like being in an action movie, the scene where someone was following you and you had to avoid talking to them so you awkwardly took a run for it while hoping that you’d lose the person chasing you.

“[Y/N], come on!” Chris’s stern voice spoke behind you as he only was a few feet away from you, also bumping into strangers but really caring as all he wanted was to get you to talk to him. You cleared your throat while thousands of thoughts swirled in your mind, you had never imagined having to run away from Chris Evans, a.k.a the guy who was head over heels in love for you.

The reason for your running was because you felt the same way but didn’t want to believe that the two of you were destined for one another. You had randomly met him in the park a few weeks ago, took one glance at him and were instantly ruined for other people. The instant attraction had left you speechless but also panicking as it the intense feelings rippling through your body was something you had ever experienced before.

Chris felt the same way and instantly knew that you were the right woman for him. So, he returned to the park whenever he could and always was so happy to find you sitting on the same bench every time. Deep and meaningful conversations were held before the actor couldn’t help himself anymore and asked if he could take you out.

That question made all the alarms in your head go off and next thing you knew, you were jogging down the street in hopes to get away from him, but silently wishing that he’d fight for you. Which he was doing.

 

I’m coming, I’ll get you, yeah
We have a connection, that’s right
'Cause girl I’m not letting go
I’m gonna make you feel right, oh yeah

Forget about your friends, they don’t care where we go
If they do, we’ll get lost in a crowd of people
I’ve been looking for you forever baby we go
Together baby we go, we go

In this crazy world of choices I’ve only got a few
Either you’re coming with me, or I’m coming with you
'Cause I finally found, I finally found you
You never have to worry if what I say is true
Girl I’ve been looking for you and when I saw you I knew
That I finally found, I finally found you

I finally found, I finally found you

Short puffs of air left your parted lips as you silently wondered how long you’d be able to jog, Chris was a few feet behind you and surprised you by reaching out for your arm and gently pulling you into an empty alley.

“W-What do you want from me? What is so special about me that you want to take me out?” you panted while resting your hands on your knees to catch your breath. Chris’s eyes never moved from you, he wasn’t panting or out of breath.

He took a step towards you and gently placed his hand on your shoulder, patiently waiting until you had caught your breath. “I want to take you out because I’ve never met anyone like you, [Y/N]. I’ve had my history with women and desperately tried to find the one of whom all the love songs, poems and romantic books are talking about.

I had given up on hope, until I met you…” the actor’s words rung in your head while you slowly stood up straight, your eyes boring into his as you couldn’t believe what he was saying. Your heart was fluttering in your chest when he moved his hand from your shoulders up to your neck, then cheek. Cupping one while smiling lovingly at you.

“Based on your reaction, I can see that you’ve also never met that one special person. I know that you feel the same way I do, [Y/N]” Chris’s voice dropped to a whisper while he took a step closer to you, only leaving a tiny gap in between your bodies. Your lips slowly parted as you lost yourself in his beautiful eyes, the longing of feeling his soft lips against yours overwhelming you.

“It wasn’t my intentions to freak you out, I’m sorry” Chris softly apologized while wrapping his strong arm around your thick waist, the delicate sensation making your head spin for a few seconds. You swallowed hard and shook your head in, “It’s okay…You’re right, I haven’t met anyone special, I’m a little bit terrified” you confessed, your hands resting on Chris’s broad shoulders, the gently touch making him sigh in contentment.

“So am I, I’m willing to do anything you want me to do…I just want you close to me, [Y/N]” the way your name delicately rolled off his tongue while his mesmerizing scent mixed with cologne filled your nostrils had your knees weakening in seconds.

“Me too” was all the confirmation Chris needed before leaning in and gently pressing his lips against yours, your heartbeat syncing with each other while you lost touch of reality. You slowly moved your lips against his while your stomach delicately churned, the unfamiliar sensation making you smile in between the kiss.

“Finally found you” Chris whispered against your lips before slowly pulling away and fluttering his eyes open, already addicted to your lips. A smile spread across your face when he smoothly took a hold of your hands and intertwined your fingers together, leading you out of the alley and taking you to the nearest café.

 

[Sammy Adams:]
Yeah, so can I get love
Too much to ask for really so tough
Find yourself moving with the sex of the drums
Got my hands full, grabbin’ all these girls, girls
Hands up, hands up
Dance floor chillin’ while I hold two cups
Can’t stop spilling, 'cause I’m drunk as fuck
And my song comes on, and the club goes nuts
Yeah, every province I go, city I sleep, it’s best that you’ll know
Running around, and doing all these shows
Round the whole globe, I come, and you go girl
And you need to think of it
Just arrive for the night, baby live a bit
With a place to hit, and your pants to zip
We can make this thing a party, are you into it

[Enrique Iglesias:]
In this crazy world of choices I’ve only got a few
Either you’re coming with me, or I’m coming with you
'Cause I finally found, I finally found you

Finally, finally, finally found you
Finally, finally, finally found
Finally found, I finally found you

You know I’m go get you, yeah

The instant attraction had left you speechless but also panicking as it the intense feelings rippling through your body was something you had ever experienced before.

Chris felt the same way and instantly knew that you were the right woman for him. So, he returned to the park whenever he could and always was so happy to find you sitting on the same bench every time. Deep and meaningful conversations were held before the actor couldn’t help himself anymore and asked if he could take you out.

That question made all the alarms in your head go off and next thing you knew, you were jogging down the street in hopes to get away from him, but silently wishing that he’d fight for you. Which he was doing.

 

I’m coming, I’ll get you, yeah
We have a connection, that’s right
'Cause girl I’m not letting go
I’m gonna make you feel right, oh yeah

Forget about your friends, they don’t care where we go
If they do, we’ll get lost in a crowd of people
I’ve been looking for you forever baby we go
Together baby we go, we go

In this crazy world of choices I’ve only got a few
Either you’re coming with me, or I’m coming with you
'Cause I finally found, I finally found you
You never have to worry if what I say is true
Girl I’ve been looking for you and when I saw you I knew
That I finally found, I finally found you

I finally found, I finally found you

Short puffs of air left your parted lips as you silently wondered how long you’d be able to jog, Chris was a few feet behind you and surprised you by reaching out for your arm and gently pulling you into an empty alley.

“W-What do you want from me? What is so special about me that you want to take me out?” you panted while resting your hands on your knees to catch your breath. Chris’s eyes never moved from you, he wasn’t panting or out of breath.

He took a step towards you and gently placed his hand on your shoulder, patiently waiting until you had caught your breath. “I want to take you out because I’ve never met anyone like you, [Y/N]. I’ve had my history with women and desperately tried to find the one of whom all the love songs, poems and romantic books are talking about.

I had given up on hope, until I met you…” the actor’s words rung in your head while you slowly stood up straight, your eyes boring into his as you couldn’t believe what he was saying. Your heart was fluttering in your chest when he moved his hand from your shoulders up to your neck, then cheek. Cupping one while smiling lovingly at you.

“Based on your reaction, I can see that you’ve also never met that one special person. I know that you feel the same way I do, [Y/N]” Chris’s voice dropped to a whisper while he took a step closer to you, only leaving a tiny gap in between your bodies. Your lips slowly parted as you lost yourself in his beautiful eyes, the longing of feeling his soft lips against yours overwhelming you.

“It wasn’t my intentions to freak you out, I’m sorry” Chris softly apologized while wrapping his strong arm around your thick waist, the delicate sensation making your head spin for a few seconds. You swallowed hard and shook your head in, “It’s okay…You’re right, I haven’t met anyone special, I’m a little bit terrified” you confessed, your hands resting on Chris’s broad shoulders, the gently touch making him sigh in contentment.

“So am I, I’m willing to do anything you want me to do…I just want you close to me, [Y/N]” the way your name delicately rolled off his tongue while his mesmerizing scent mixed with cologne filled your nostrils had your knees weakening in seconds.

“Me too” was all the confirmation Chris needed before leaning in and gently pressing his lips against yours, your heartbeat syncing with each other while you lost touch of reality. You slowly moved your lips against his while your stomach delicately churned, the unfamiliar sensation making you smile in between the kiss.

“Finally found you” Chris whispered against your lips before slowly pulling away and fluttering his eyes open, already addicted to your lips. A smile spread across your face when he smoothly took a hold of your hands and intertwined your fingers together, leading you out of the alley and taking you to the nearest café.

Yeah, so can I get love
Too much to ask for really so tough
Find yourself moving with the sex of the drums
Got my hands full, grabbin’ all these girls, girls
Hands up, hands up
Dance floor chillin’ while I hold two cups
Can’t stop spilling, 'cause I’m drunk as fuck
And my song comes on, and the club goes nuts
Yeah, every province I go, city I sleep, it’s best that you’ll know
Running around, and doing all these shows
Round the whole globe, I come, and you go girl
And you need to think of it
Just arrive for the night, baby live a bit
With a place to hit, and your pants to zip
We can make this thing a party, are you into it

[Enrique Iglesias:]
In this crazy world of choices I’ve only got a few
Either you’re coming with me, or I’m coming with you
'Cause I finally found, I finally found you

Finally, finally, finally found you
Finally, finally, finally found
Finally found, I finally found you

You know I’m go get you, yeah

body:
Requested?    Yes  l   No

By: @jazmynejack​

Pairing: Chris Evans x Black plus sized reader x Winston Duke

Summary: Can we do a 3 way with a black reader with Winston duke and Chris Evans inspired by the song the one by Jorja Smith please and thank you love

Warning(s): NSFW 18+only, Poly!fic, protected sex, oral sex (male and female receiving)

Word count: 896

Edit was made by me

Never had to work for love
Don’t need you to show me how
Don’t want to be falling in
When I’m falling out
Didn’t think I’d give for love
Every time I hold it back
Now there’s lust in my head
I’m tryna find who I am


There’s choosers, there’s takers
There’s begging heartbreakers
I don’t wanna be that way
You will never hear me say
Come hold me, console me
When really I’m lonely
Even if I feel this way
I don’t wanna feel this way
When I…

 

“I-I…” you stuttered while rubbing your cheeks in frustration, not knowing how to deal with the whole situation. Chris and Winston shot each other a look as they were standing in front of you, both holding a bouquet of your favorite flowers (but different colors) in their hands.

Your heart was pounding and fluttering in your chest, your mind swirling with so many thoughts as you didn’t know what to do. “There is no pressure, [Y/N]” Winston’s smooth voice reassured you while a frown rested on his face, not liking that he was one of the reason for your distress.

Chris sighed and nodded his head, “This may be a weird situation-“You cut him off “Oh no, not weird. Unimaginable” you huffed. Both men bit their lip as they didn’t know how to react to your comment.

It would have never occurred to you that two handsome actors would be interested in you, at the same time. You had always been struggling at finding a love interest, then did everything possible to stay in a relationship, even if it meant doing things you weren’t comfortable or unfamiliar with.

You had accepted your “fate” and thought that you would always have to bend over backwards to please your lovers, not expecting much in return. To now have Chris Evans AND Winston Duke ready to fight for your love like the handsome knights in the romantic novels made you realize how you’ve never had really experienced true love.

The other problem was that you had taken your time into getting to know the two actors and found yourself falling head over heels for both. They both treated you with the upmost respect and kindness, made you feel like a goddess by spoiling you with gifts, gentle kisses and the most beautiful love confessions.

You had been honest with the two of them and told them about each other, surprised to see that they weren’t mad or jealous. But Chris and Duke were dying to know who you were willing to give a chance at being your lover.

“I like you too so much” you sighed and shook your head, the thought of having to drop one of them making your heart painfully clench in your chest. You had been floating on cloud nine ever since Chris and Winston had waltzed into your life and you didn’t want the delicate sentiments to stop because you were already addicted to them.

“And we like you, [Y/N]” both men said at the same time, their eyes showing nothing but love and determination. You took a step towards them and placed a hand on their toned chest, your fingers tingling at the gentle touch.

“And I don’t want to lose you both” you confessed, slowly looking from Winston to Chris. It was a very selfish thing for you to say but you didn’t want to lie. You had learned so much about yourself through the way the two men had been treating you. Your confidence was bursting through the roof and you appreciated the smallest things in life, but to have to say goodbye to either Chris or Winston wasn’t something you wanted to do.

 

Meet someone
I don’t want to need no one
I’m not tryna let you in
Even if I’ve found the one

Never had to wait for love
Always thought it’d come around
You come for me
But I’m nowhere to be found
Cancellations for conversations
I don’t need right now
I’m afraid of these relations
I can’t be tied down

There’s choosers, there’s takers
There’s begging heartbreakers
I don’t wanna be that way
I don’t wanna feel this way
When I…

 

“I wish that I could just date you both” you sighed again before licking your lips, the thought of you dating both men already making your heart flutter in your chest. While you slowly zoned out, Chris and Winston shot each other a questioning look. None of them had ever been in a polyamorous relationship, had barely even thought about it but the chance of getting to be in one with you was something they instantly were getting fond of.

Chris cleared his throat, pulling you out of your delicate day dream while Winston took the hand that was resting on his chest in his and gently squeezed it. Chris copied his actions which made you furrow your eyebrows in confusion while they smiled at you, their eyes sparkling brightly.

“You can” Winston and Chris said at the same time, making your eyes widen while a soft gasp escaped your lips.

“R-Really?” you questioned while grinning at both men who nodded their head at your word.

“You are a queen we can’t afford losing, [Y/N]. You’ve made our lives so much better and it’s not a problem for us to share you” Chris whispered before leaning in, pressing a tender kiss against your cheek. The emotions that ran through your body were indescribable while Winston copied his action before whispering sweet words in your ear.

“I can’t believe this” you grinned, your heart bursting from love and happiness. “This is amazing” you gushed while engulfing Winston in a tight hug, loving the feeling of his strong arms wrapped around your thick waist.

“This will be amazing” Chris grinned when it was his turn to hold you close, his heart was skipping a beat when your delicate scent filled his nostrils. After pulling away, the two men placed the bouquets on the kitchen counter put their hands in their pockets. “So, what are we going to do?” Winston asked.

“We are going to sit down on the couch and talk about our relationship before making out” you grinned, holding your hands out to both men who chuckled before joining you on the way to the living room, excited about the new chapter they of life they were entering.

 

Meet someone
I don’t wanna need no one
I’m not tryna let you in
Even if I’ve found the one

I don’t wanna feel this way
When I…

Meet someone
I don’t wanna need no one
I’m not tryna let you in
Even if I’ve found the one

Requested?    Yes  l   No

By: @jazmynejack​

Pairing: Chris Evans x Black plus sized reader x Winston Duke

Summary: Can we do a 3 way with a black reader with Winston duke and Chris Evans inspired by the song the one by Jorja Smith please and thank you love

Warning(s): NSFW 18+only, Poly!fic, protected sex, oral sex (male and female receiving)

Word count: 896

Edit was made by me

Never had to work for love
Don’t need you to show me how
Don’t want to be falling in
When I’m falling out
Didn’t think I’d give for love
Every time I hold it back
Now there’s lust in my head
I’m tryna find who I am


There’s choosers, there’s takers
There’s begging heartbreakers
I don’t wanna be that way
You will never hear me say
Come hold me, console me
When really I’m lonely
Even if I feel this way
I don’t wanna feel this way
When I…

 

“I-I…” you stuttered while rubbing your cheeks in frustration, not knowing how to deal with the whole situation. Chris and Winston shot each other a look as they were standing in front of you, both holding a bouquet of your favorite flowers (but different colors) in their hands.

Your heart was pounding and fluttering in your chest, your mind swirling with so many thoughts as you didn’t know what to do. “There is no pressure, [Y/N]” Winston’s smooth voice reassured you while a frown rested on his face, not liking that he was one of the reason for your distress.

Chris sighed and nodded his head, “This may be a weird situation-“You cut him off “Oh no, not weird. Unimaginable” you huffed. Both men bit their lip as they didn’t know how to react to your comment.

It would have never occurred to you that two handsome actors would be interested in you, at the same time. You had always been struggling at finding a love interest, then did everything possible to stay in a relationship, even if it meant doing things you weren’t comfortable or unfamiliar with.

You had accepted your “fate” and thought that you would always have to bend over backwards to please your lovers, not expecting much in return. To now have Chris Evans AND Winston Duke ready to fight for your love like the handsome knights in the romantic novels made you realize how you’ve never had really experienced true love.

The other problem was that you had taken your time into getting to know the two actors and found yourself falling head over heels for both. They both treated you with the upmost respect and kindness, made you feel like a goddess by spoiling you with gifts, gentle kisses and the most beautiful love confessions.

You had been honest with the two of them and told them about each other, surprised to see that they weren’t mad or jealous. But Chris and Duke were dying to know who you were willing to give a chance at being your lover.

“I like you too so much” you sighed and shook your head, the thought of having to drop one of them making your heart painfully clench in your chest. You had been floating on cloud nine ever since Chris and Winston had waltzed into your life and you didn’t want the delicate sentiments to stop because you were already addicted to them.

“And we like you, [Y/N]” both men said at the same time, their eyes showing nothing but love and determination. You took a step towards them and placed a hand on their toned chest, your fingers tingling at the gentle touch.

“And I don’t want to lose you both” you confessed, slowly looking from Winston to Chris. It was a very selfish thing for you to say but you didn’t want to lie. You had learned so much about yourself through the way the two men had been treating you. Your confidence was bursting through the roof and you appreciated the smallest things in life, but to have to say goodbye to either Chris or Winston wasn’t something you wanted to do.

 

Meet someone
I don’t want to need no one
I’m not tryna let you in
Even if I’ve found the one

Never had to wait for love
Always thought it’d come around
You come for me
But I’m nowhere to be found
Cancellations for conversations
I don’t need right now
I’m afraid of these relations
I can’t be tied down

There’s choosers, there’s takers
There’s begging heartbreakers
I don’t wanna be that way
I don’t wanna feel this way
When I…

 

“I wish that I could just date you both” you sighed again before licking your lips, the thought of you dating both men already making your heart flutter in your chest. While you slowly zoned out, Chris and Winston shot each other a questioning look. None of them had ever been in a polyamorous relationship, had barely even thought about it but the chance of getting to be in one with you was something they instantly were getting fond of.

Chris cleared his throat, pulling you out of your delicate day dream while Winston took the hand that was resting on his chest in his and gently squeezed it. Chris copied his actions which made you furrow your eyebrows in confusion while they smiled at you, their eyes sparkling brightly.

“You can” Winston and Chris said at the same time, making your eyes widen while a soft gasp escaped your lips.

“R-Really?” you questioned while grinning at both men who nodded their head at your word.

“You are a queen we can’t afford losing, [Y/N]. You’ve made our lives so much better and it’s not a problem for us to share you” Chris whispered before leaning in, pressing a tender kiss against your cheek. The emotions that ran through your body were indescribable while Winston copied his action before whispering sweet words in your ear.

“I can’t believe this” you grinned, your heart bursting from love and happiness. “This is amazing” you gushed while engulfing Winston in a tight hug, loving the feeling of his strong arms wrapped around your thick waist.

“This will be amazing” Chris grinned when it was his turn to hold you close, his heart was skipping a beat when your delicate scent filled his nostrils. After pulling away, the two men placed the bouquets on the kitchen counter put their hands in their pockets. “So, what are we going to do?” Winston asked.

“We are going to sit down on the couch and talk about our relationship before making out” you grinned, holding your hands out to both men who chuckled before joining you on the way to the living room, excited about the new chapter they of life they were entering.

 

Meet someone
I don’t wanna need no one
I’m not tryna let you in
Even if I’ve found the one

I don’t wanna feel this way
When I…

Meet someone
I don’t wanna need no one
I’m not tryna let you in
Even if I’ve found the one

title: Headcanon: Tattoos
body:
Requested?    Yes  l   No

By:@msdrpreist​

Pairing: Chris Evans x Latina plus sized reader

Summary: hey i see your back ahh. could i please have a tattooed mexican woman who meets chris evans in a tattoo parlor when she goes to get a collar bone piece while hes getting his tattoos done. im glad your back hun

Warning(s): none

Word count: 493

Picture(s) found on: Pinterest/Google

-Getting new tattoos was always a something special for you as all yours had a special meaning. To you, the tattoos were like a story being told on your skin and for everybody to see as you went on with your day

-You had been thinking about getting a new one done on your collar bone and began to think about what it should be. You knew that the collar bone was a very sensitive area to get a tattoo on but you knew that it would be worth the pain, and money of course

-After coming up with the perfect sentence and drawing with your tattooist, you were so excited to finally get it done and flaunt it. While the tattooist was in the middle of preparing the ink and needle, you turned your head to the side and almost choked on your saliva upon seeing Chris Evans sitting a few feet away from you

-He was in the middle of getting his tattoo inked on his arm when your glances met and he shot you a bright smile, immediately drawn to your beauty. All you could do was let out short and awkward coughs while giving him a small wave, not wanting to believe what was happening

-Two minutes later, you were clenching your jaw as the needle on your collar bone felt uncomfortable and painful. The parlor was filled with the buzzing sound while Chris couldn’t stop staring at you, determined to get to know you as you already had something in common: tattoos

-You didn’t pay much attention to the actor as the pain slowly became unbearable, you had your eyes clenched shut while trying to picture your favorite things and people while hoping that it wouldn’t take too long to get your tattoo done

-“I like your tattoo” Chris’s delicate voice pulled you out of your painful daze, he was suddenly sitting at your side and watching your little piece of art being completed. “Thanks” you smiled, suddenly forgetting about the pain and so mesmerized by the actor’s beautiful eyes

-It didn’t take the two of you long to start a conversation, it went from tattoos to shared hobbies and interests. You didn’t see the smirk the tattooist had on his face as he knew that a beautiful connection was being created in between you and Chris

-Twenty minutes later, you were released from the pain and awestruck at your new masterpiece proudly resting on your collar bone. “It’s amazing” you and Chis gushed at the same time while you admired it in the mirror

-“May I take you to lunch?” Chris immediately asked once you had payed for your tattoo and engulfed your tattooist in a tight hug as he always blessed you with his amazing talent. “Sure” you grinned before the two of you left the parlor, your arms brushing against each other while you made your way down the street to the nearest food establishment

blog.description: Hi there! I'm Helen and nothing makes me qualified to judge movies, books or generally art save for the fact that I love it. Feel free to share your own opinions! I'll be doing monthly recs on music, movies or my general favorites! I'd love it if you join me :)

body:
Before We Go (2014)

dir. Chris Evans

When I started watching, I had no idea the embodiment of Captain America would have directed it but here we are.

Listen, it might just be me, but it’s been an emotional day. This movie was just the cherry on top. So, let’s take a walk.

Before We Go is a movie about two people who accidentally meet in a train station. Brooke (Alice Eve) has her purse stolen and misses her train to Boston and out of spite and kindness, a jazzy trumpet-playing busker, Nick (Chris Evans) makes it his mission to get her home.

Now, if it sounds romantic and wildly unrealistic, well, yeah okay it is a little bit. But I can happily say I was so pleasantly surprised. I walked in on this movie ready to have my teeth rot off the accidental, i-just-met-you-i’m-in-love typical cliché romance, but was instead met with this beautiful story of two very three dimensional, troubled characters that were about to have the longest night of their lives.

The first thing I noticed about this is how it had a continuation. I got lost in the stories of these characters, in their past and their future. Stories that were totally believable, if you ask me, stories that fit perfectly and had shaped their dialogue and mannerisms, and that simply just made sense. I didn’t doubt them. I didn’t see two actors acting in a movie. I saw characters with depth that I got completely lost in.

Another very important thing is that they were FLAWED. I value this so much. They weren’t your typical, perfect, drop dead gorgeous, incredible fictional characters, no. They made mistakes. They were human, in the best way a movie without a very deep meaning could offer. And they weren’t complete fuck-ups either. It was a very successful in-between.

Also, it’s a very damn quotable movie. You know, phrases that will be etched in the margins of teenage textbooks out of boredom or hope or sadness. Quotes that are relatable and perfectly worded and just all around lovely executed and nicely placed in the best parts of the movie.

Speaking of quotes, a lot of the dialogue was also pretty natural. Admittedly, not all of it, some was a little awkward to me, but the banter, Nick’s jokes? Just damn.

Also, the whole movie touched on subjects that I personally haven’t seen very often. Loving more than one person. That’s a first. It’s not all-consuming “I’m yours and you’re mine even if I met you three hours ago” type bull. No, it’s a friendship that, even when the Kiss™ was initiated, it wasn’t mutually accepted you know? It was made awkward and a bit off and it didn’t exactly work but it was okay. Because both their feelings were mutually respected. It wasn’t forced romance and love and magic, it was awkward and a little wrong and that was the realistic part. Neither of the two was looking for that type of thing, and they didn’t feel comfortable with a new dynamic yet.

Their parting kiss didn’t have the same meaning. It was more like saying goodbye to someone who meant a lot, because they did end up meaning a lot to one another. They learned a lot because of each other. That kiss was more like a meaningful goodbye than deep rooted love or something of the sort.

I’m not too mad at the ending, to be honest. It was a bit lousy and yeah, the whole note thing was excessive, trying to achieve an unnecessary sentimentality in a way that could’ve probably been delivered better, however it didn’t overshadow the rest of the movie so, I’m not gonna fault it for giving the viewer some hope for a continuation.

All in all, a solid 8/10 for that one. I enjoyed watching it, I laughed and I cried a little bit. Perfect for a sweet non-rom-com mood or a sleepover with a good friend and pints of ice cream and beer.

Also. Chris Evans with a beard. That is all.

Sarah's Master List

title: Sarah’s Masterlist
body:
I write mostly fluff and angst however there is some smut so please 18+ only

Thanks for reading and please message me if you want to be added to any of my tag lists:  All – Chris/Steve – Sebastian/Bucky – Or By Fic

Chris Evans/Steve Rogers

One Shots

Let’s Build A Fort – CE - (Fluff, Family Fun)

Last Christmas – SR - (Angst, Breakup)

Never Enough – SR - (Angst, Unrequited Love)

To Me You Are Perfect – SR - (Breakup, Fluff)

Never Have I Ever - SR - (Fluff, Drinking, Swearing, Smut)

Numb - SR - (Angst, unrequited love)

Size Perfect - SR - (Fluff, insecurities, swearing)

Masquerade - CE - (Fluff)

Series

This started as a one shot but the inspiration kept flowing and I kind of wanted a happy ending for them – SR - (Angst, Heartbreak)

Standing In The Dark

Need You Now

When Love And Hate Collide

Disney Romance – CE – (Fluff, Smut (18+only please), swearing)

Summary: A holiday to Disney turns out a more eventful than you could have imagined

The Girl Next Door – SR – (Swearing, angst, sexual content)

Summary: You move into the apartment next to Bucky and Steve, things don’t start off well as Steve gets annoyed with your loud music playing all the time, but could this be a love/hate relationship

Sebastian Stan/Bucky Barnes

One Shots

Candyman – BB - (Fluff, Fun)

Dear Daughter – BB - (Angst, Death)

Perfectly Perfect – BB - (Depression, Fluff)

Bubbles - SS - (Fluff, Mentions of Sex)

Secrets and Singing - BB - (Fluff, Secret Pining)

Series

I am Beautiful With You – BB – (Self Loathing, Scars, Fluff, Swearing, Angst)

Summary: New to the Avengers, you were experimented in by Hydra, you hated what they had done to you, never showing the scars that littered your body

#1

A Night At The Movies – SS - (Fluff, Self-Loathing, Smut (eventually)

Summary: After being stood up by your boyfriend, you meet a stranger that changes your views about yourself

Friends and Lovers – BB – (Fluff, Swearing, Angst, Smut (18+ only please)

Summary: You are best friends with Bucky, but one night won’t change that…. Will it?

Dancing Series – BB - (Swearing, Angst, Cheating)

Summary: Bucky broke your heart and broke the family he never knew he had, is he truly sorry and can he get back what he has lost

Other

A Thousand Years - Stucky (Sort of) - (Fluff, Angst, Memories)

Astronaut - No Pairing – (Depression, suicidal thoughts, loneliness, happy ending!)   -  Summary: Two strangers find you at your lowest point

Breaking Point – No Pairing – (Suicide attempt, depression, angst, bullying)  - Summary: You work at Stark Towers, you have never felt so lonely and invisible, after a rough day things get a little too much for you
